title: "Scientists use machine learning to help fight antibiotic resistance in farmed chickens"
excerpt: "Scientists have used machine learning to find new ways to identify and pinpoint disease in poultry farms, which will help to reduce the need for antibiotic treatment, lowering the risk of antibiotic resistance transferring to human populations."
